programme.title: Bellator Champions Series: Pitbull vs. Kennedy
programme.desc: Brazilian Patrício Pitbull defends the Bellator world featherweight title against Canadian Jeremy Kennedy.

programme.title: Coastal Odyssey - Flying Over the Northern California Coast
programme.desc: Soar over the Northern California Coast and experience dramatic sea cliffs, sea arches, waterfalls and crashing waves in "Coastal Odyssey". This 1hour film also features an uplifting musical soundtrack to accompany the inspiring scenes. This film is available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Morning at the Marsh
programme.desc: Experience the beauty and serenity of the California Bay Area wetlands, home to many species of birds and other wildlife. Relaxing bird songs accompany the spectacular visuals in "Morning at the Marsh". The full 80 minute long film is available to subscribers of www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Yellowstone & The Tetons Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: Experience the majesty of Americas Yellowstone and Grand Teton National Parks. Soaring mountains, amazing wildlife, exploding geysers and bubbling geothermal ponds are the stars of this 2 hour ambient nature film. A soothing acoustic guitar soundtrack enhances the calming beauty of this film.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Mark Ruffalo Jennifer Garner Support In Friendship
programme.desc: One night, Mark Ruffalo woke up SOBBING from a terrible nightmare. He dreamed he received a medical diagnosis FROM HELL, which later became true! His resilience was put to the test. But why did he choose to hide the tragic news from his wife? And what did co-star Jennifer Garner think of him on the set of "13 going on 30"?

programme.title: Dave Bautista Kumail Nanjiani True To Yourself
programme.desc: Kumail Nanjiani SHOCKED the world when he achieved an EXTREME body transformation! Despite being a famous comedian, actor, and screenwriter, Kumails real life was NOT all glamorous. What tragedy struck before he could propose to his wife? And how did Dave Bautista make things WORSE?

programme.title: Ben Affleck Jennifer Lopez Together Again
programme.desc: Prior to getting back with JLo, Ben Afflecks life had been nothing short of TRAGIC... Why was Jennifer Garner completely fed up with him? And how did Ben almost DESTROY his family?

programme.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger Rebuilding Family
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger was forced to be tough at an early age. Abused by his father, Arnold tried to bury his painful past by putting all of his energy into bodybuilding. When he started a family with his wife, everything appeared perfect to the outside world... Until Arnold was publicly exposed for cheating on his wife and destroying his family. Why did Arnold cheat? And how far back do the lies go?

programme.title: Naomi Campbell Nelson Mandella Defending A Model
programme.desc: Supermodel Naomi Campbell was one of the most in-demand models of her time, but when the violent side of Naomi came out, she faced 7 years in prison! Then... Nelson Mandela stepped in to teach her a powerful lesson. Why did Nelson Mandela defend the world’s most controversial model?

programme.title: Britney Spears Finally Free
programme.desc: Britney Spears ESCAPED her conservatorship but she still has ONE FIGHT LEFT! She﻿ tried to tell the world what her family kept secret for 13 years, but her father threatened her. In this video, their dark secrets are finally REVEALED.

programme.title: Kourtney Scott Family Breakdown
programme.desc: It took 10 YEARS of fighting and heartbreaks for ﻿Kourtney Kardashian to FINALLY walk away from her ex, Scott Disick. She then fell MADLY IN LOVE with musician Travis Barker, and that made Scott absurdly JEALOUS! Why did Kourtneys family CONTINUE to be supportive of Scott despite his toxic behavior?

programme.title: Dave Bautista Breaking Out of the Box
programme.desc: Desperate to make a change in his life, Dave Bautista left his brutal childhood behind to become a wrestler. But when the WWE denied Dave from pursuing his biggest dream, everything started breaking down. Why did Dave walk away from a successful career in the WWE? And why did John Cena make everything worse?

programme.title: Megan Fox s Hollywood Struggle
programme.desc: Voted “Sexiest Woman Alive”, Megan Fox lived a secret life where she was thrown into dark, inappropriate and disturbing situations as early as 15 years old.

programme.title: Vin Paul Forever Family
programme.desc: When the explosive news of Paul Walker’s death surfaced, it shocked the world. The Fast and Furious franchise would never be the same - and Paul’s daughter, Meadow Walker, was left without a father. So why did Paul leave her with Vin Diesel? And what important lesson on parenting did Paul teach Vin before he passed away?

programme.title: Jane Fonda Vs. The US Government
programme.desc: Actress Jane Fonda took the public by surprise when she was photographed overseas for her activism. When Nixon found out, Jane became target enemy #1 and the country called her “despicable”. Why was the President suspicious of Jane’s motives? And how did Jane Fonda fight back?

programme.title: Courteney Cox Never Give Up
programme.desc: Courteney Cox made the world laugh on the hit tv series, ‘Friends’, but when Courteney lost her baby to a miscarriage, she had to fake a smile and hide her secret loss. But Jennifer Aniston knew the truth… What’s the real reason Courteney couldnt have a baby?

programme.title: Halsey The Road To Motherhood
programme.desc: Living with bipolar disorder, singer Halsey went from suicidal and living on the streets to becoming a Grammy-nominated artist. Now, Halsey opens up about their painful condition, and how AGAINST ALL ODDS they were able to live their dream life of becoming a mother.

programme.title: A Father's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Should parents control their children or trust them to do the right thing?

programme.title: Man of Ice Wim Hof s Dark Secret
programme.desc: Wim Hof baffles experts --thriving in freezing cold temperatures and swimming under ice in just shorts. But little did the world know that The Ice Man was harboring a heartbreaking secret that drove him to try & conquer the bitter cold.

programme.title: The Fundamental Truth About Love
programme.desc: Adam Reid Shares Expert Advice on a Fundamental Truth About Love. This Speech about the true source of love will change how you approach relationships forever!

programme.title: Find Your Way Back
programme.desc: Lisa Nichols delivers a powerful speech on how she struggled with abuse and depression and what these experiences taught her, and shares the best actionable advice on how to overcome even your most troubling times.

programme.title: Frank Shamrock Becoming a Warrior
programme.desc: Legendary UFC fighter Frank Shamrock was at the top of the fighting world. But when Frank finally opened up about his torturous past, he was humiliated and deathly afraid of what was yet to come. Who nearly destroyed the toughest fighter on the Earth?

programme.title: Make Your Bed
programme.desc: US Navy Admiral, William H. McRaven, delivers a speech about the importance of doing the little things like making your bed, embracing the fears of life, and changing the world for generations to come.

programme.title: Real Stories With Jordan Peterson
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with clinical psychologist, YouTube personality and author, Jordan Peterson in this exclusive Goalcast interview. Peterson opens up about meeting his wife as a child, his marriage, children and more.

programme.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
programme.desc: Navy SEAL David Rutherfords tragic tale of a fallen comrade shows you how to live the "Team Life".

programme.title: Statistic or Success Story
programme.desc: Josh Shipp brings us to the critical turning point in his life and explains how you can make a difference.

programme.title: Surviving the Impossible
programme.desc: Raw, real and truly life-changing, Michael Crossland shares his harrowing account of surviving cancer as a baby, surviving a deadly treatment that was meant to cure him and the lessons he learned through it all.

programme.title: Jay Shetty Lesson from a Famous Failure
programme.desc: In this candid speech, former monk and internet guru Jay Shetty reflects on his sacred tenure and finds the one universal lesson that he learned through his years of struggle.

programme.title: Life Lesson from a Deaf Comedian
programme.desc: Kathy Buckley the “Deaf comedian”, jokes her way to sharing her perspective on life, self-love and forgiveness

programme.title: When to HOLD OFF on Doing Roth Conversions
programme.desc: "John in Boston is in the 32 tax bracket. Should he do Roth conversions? Flight Deck Dad and Irish Girl in Pensacola have a lot of tax-free pension income. Should they do Roth conversions? Bert and Ernie in New Jersey wonder if they should convert to Roth or take advantage of zero percent capital gains tax rates. Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA spitball for all of them, today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 529. Plus, Michael and his wife in Bellevue are 34, in the 24 tax bracket and wonder if they should contribute to tax-free or tax-deferred accounts, and if they should slow down on retirement savings and start a bridging account for the years between when they want to punch the clock in their early to mid-50s, and when they can access their retirement savings. Then for something completely different, Frenchie from Maine writes back in: what are the disadvantages to paying off her mortgage ASAP, and whats the tax-efficiency of a money market compared to bond funds?"

programme.title: Rules for Inheritances and Making Roth Contributions for Others
programme.desc: "Can Ted and Georgette convert $1.6M in an inherited trust to Roth without distributing it? Should the trust own their home so they can use the home equity? Melissa was added as joint owner on her parents bank accounts after a medical event, but what have they done? Should Ralph and Alice use the required minimum distribution from their inherited IRA to pay Roth conversion taxes? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 504 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, can Theodore contribute to his wife Louise s Roth IRA? Can Marc make Roth contributions for his grandkids? Joe and Al come up with a unique way John may be able to pay the tax on his Roth conversion using home equity."

programme.title: The Great Wealth Transfer... Won t Change Anything probably
programme.desc: "In the coming decades, the wealthiest generation in history will… die. So that means that when life finds a way and this wealth is passed down it should fix these generational issues right? Wrong…"

programme.title: Business Ethics
programme.desc: "It’s understandable that investors would like their money going towards companies that are (at the very least) TRYING to do the right thing, but unfortunately not many people really understand how these investments work, or how they could actually be making these problems a lot worse. So it’s time to learn How Money Works to find out why corporate ethics, is the second worst idea in business history."

programme.title: TFD The Dos and Donts of Preparing for a Recession
programme.desc: In this episode, Chelsea dives into the dos and donts of financially preparing for a recession. You cant always prevent the worst from happening, but you can prepare for it, from staying in a stable job to fleshing out your emergency fund.

programme.title: TFD We re In Our nepo baby Era And It s Terrible
programme.desc: In a classic Chelsea rant, we get to the bottom of why nepo babies in Hollywood are so annoying and the very real economic downsides they signify for the rest of us.

programme.title: You Want To Learn How To Actually Get Rich
programme.desc: "We tackle the million-dollar question: how do you actually get rich? This comprehensive guide breaks down proven strategies, investment tips, and key habits of the wealthy, offering you the tools you need to pursue your financial goals and build the wealth you desire."

programme.title: If You re Struggling With Money Watch These 23 Minutes
programme.desc: "This episode addresses the challenges of financial struggle and provides practical advice for turning your situation around. With insights from financial experts, we offer a 23-minute guide filled with actionable tips that can help you regain control of your finances and start building a better future."

programme.title: Root Financial How to manage asset allocation and asset location
programme.desc: How can asset allocation and asset location impact your overall financial plan? Understanding asset allocation and asset location can enhance your portfolio returns over time to ensure youre optimizing your portfolio to help you reach your goals. programme.title: FINDING CALLARO
programme.desc: The once beautiful and lush Planet Kepler is now dry and near death, after its precocious Callaro plant was exploited to extinction by Earthers because the Callaro plant was known throughout the galaxy as a source of super energy. In this outer space 3-D animated adventure reminiscent of JIMMY NEUTRON and AVATAR, three brave Kepler SpaceKids, Axel, Jono, and Gaga, want to rebuild their desolate planet by following the ancient legend of the lost Callaro oasis. Axel leads his friends into danger as they battle evil Earthers, giant spaceships, and destructive Robots as they journey down the depths of a volcano to retrieve the last Callaro seed and try to save the planet.

Now prisoners in their own home, the couple is turned against one another and forced to relive their dirty little secrets. Their domestic quarrel turns in to a nightmare they might never awaken from.

Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 7
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Interview with Erode Mahesh
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: SPICED UP
programme.desc: It is a regular day at Hotel Kelifornia. But things change when a political convoy breaks down just in front of the hotel and the politician with his chelas come into the hotel. Chai Raja is super-excited to have VIP guest. To serve his the best of his tea, Chai Raja opens a special shelf and takes out a very specially protected rack. It is a small herbarium filled with the most exoctic tea saplings...sure to make Chai Rajas brews that much more irresistible. Sundar is assigned the responsibility of taking care of the saplings...but Basha has to stick his monkey-snout into the affairs so that Sundar would be too caught up trying to keep the exotic saplings safe from harm and would be distracted from the snack shelf which is Bashastarget.. Now Basha has two distractions to mess with and make Sundars life more miserable. Sundar stumbles, fumbles and lurches through service till his clashes with Basha ends in Sundar landing the herbarium on the VIP guest. Everything in the shop reaches the VIP guest, except for the tea. He is beaten, bruised and infuriated. And when he couldnt take it anymore and he is about to get out, poor Sundar somehow gets the tea to him. Raged beyond words, he sips the special tea.. It is heaven!!! He loves itttt. He thanks Chai Raja, and leaves the teashop a happy man (yet bruised and limping). Sundar is ecstatic. And Basha is flummoxed!

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: CRUNCHY SHAADI
programme.desc: A newly married couple straight from the mandap is passing by Hotel Kelifornia when the bride still in the wedding dress (with ghoonghat) smells the yummy fried murukku and the piping hot tea. She wants to try and her young and chivalrous husband would give his beautiful wife anything she wants. The couple comes in and the husband is all grandiose personified to impress his wife. Sundar is all ready to please them. And our little Basha finds this the right opportunity to grab the crispy murukkus. He makes sure that none of the food which Sundar carries, goes to the couple. And Basha comes up with crazy ways including disguising as the groom (with sehera) to grab and eat the food from the brides plate before she could even smell them. The bride is angered by the groom who is incapable of feeding her. The poor groom is trying everything possible to win the heart of his young wife. It is madness inside the hotel and Sundar is going nuts. At last the bride is fed up. She whacks the hell out of the useless groom. Basha now changes his plan and does things in such a way that the groom thinks that Sundar has been messing with him. The groom is furious and exposes Sundar to his bride and then throws him away. Then the chivalrous groom takes a huge plate full of snacks and offers it to his wife. Awww it is love all over again!! And the couple walk away in full on romance. With a crying Sundar looking at them. Basha is chewing the fag end of the yummy kacha-kela-bhajiya!

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: GoGo and UGo are close siblings. While collecting mushrooms, they smell something delicious and find a house made of snacks. When they cheerfully walk in, the two realizes it belongs to a scary wizard.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Pineapple Rain
programme.desc: When Nardys pizza propagating machine goes awry, he tosses it out the window and into the hands of Biggs who turns it into an extreme weather making machine. Can Nardy and the other Smighties stop it in time?

programme.title: Mysterious stranger_1
programme.desc: The stranger walks thru the old library, snapping pictures and making notes all the while mumbling incoherently under his breath, when He stops and rings a bell.he Creepy Candy decide to have the Hooligan J. Beans follow Mr. Dark into the bathroom. They hide and watch. as he goes to the sink and removes his glasses and looks in the mirror.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: TRAPPED
programme.desc: Sundar is chucking the peels and rubbish (after a mild run-in with Basha) into a compost pit when he notices a queer little sapling with a lovely bud like flower. When Sundar tickles the bud, the plant twitches as if responding to the touch. Intrigued, Sundar scoops up the sapling to a coconut shell and brings it to the hotel but is quickly divested off it as Chai Raja ushers him to clean up before turning in. Chai Raja sloshes his special night brew and some spills onto the plant. The plant shudders unnoticed by anyone, the brew boosting its growth so quickly...that by morning when Sundar wakes up he shrieks to find a massive venus fly trap in place of the small fragile sapling he had left the night before. Chai Raja though does freak out in the beginning does let Sundar keep the huge plant pet once he sees its adeptness at keeping the tables clean off flies, especially when rewarded with sips of tea! Basha finding the plant extremely quirky pranks it with pepper seeds and thats it. The plant now breathing fire chases after Basha himself. And Sundar is thrilled at first, but then things fly wrong as the plant starts wrecking the hotel. It is literally a war in the hotel and Sundar is at his wits end, so is Chai Raja. But Basha is having a good time, though the plant is impartial even towards Basha. Going into magic space.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: A sticky situation
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a sticky wrapper and the twins arrive in a sandy desert. They travel to the pond world and to the winter world before they can put it in a bin.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: Toothbrush
programme.desc: Be prepared to be brushed off your feet with this entertaining episode

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: A strange Footprint
programme.desc: Bubbles reads a story about scary monsters to Doubt and Caber. Duda finds her funny, but Caber is really scared. The next morning, Bubbles finds a giant footprint in the ground. Doubt and Caber thinks a monster did it, but Bubbles and Dad tell them that monsters dont exist. Hearing all the commotion about monsters, Scot decides to dress up as one and scare everyone for fun. When he tries to scare Duda, things dont go as planned. Instead of being afraid, Duda is excited to meet the "monster." Duda chases the "monster" up a tree, but soon discovers that he is just a Scotsman in disguise. Suddenly, something falls from the tree! Scot runs away, screaming that he is a real monster. Maybe monsters really exist...

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Makilakiski – Makilakiski
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of “The Magic Table, the Golden Donkey and the Cudgel in the Sack” by the Brothers Grimm. In it, a magic cudgel has been stolen from its owner, a humble TAILOR. Shortly after, a terrible crime was committed with the cudgel: the theft of the royal treasure. As a consequence, the TAILOR and his three sons have been arrested by the royal guard and if the gold does not appear by dawn, the TAILOR and his sons will be executed. SANDRA will need to draw on all her talent and bravery to resolve this difficult case in less than 6 hours

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: The New Fred
programme.desc: After Fred clumsily insults Nora, he commands Friday to do his talking for him, transforming into a neck piece Fred wears, imitating his voice, and giving him a shock when he tries to speak for himself. Friday’s bold personality rehabilitates Fred’s reputation, until he short circuits and starts insulting everyone.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Knot My Problem
programme.desc: Maple keeps forgetting how to tie her shoes until Promi shows her a way to remember. Practice makes perfect, and perseverance leads to achievement.

programme.title: Treasure Map Adventure
programme.desc: The Super Six and Sneevil race to find a hidden treasure over land and sea, facing obstacles along the way. When they enter the Smightymuda Triangle, things get even rockier and wild. Who will make it out and find the treasure first?

programme.title: Biggerish
programme.desc: Maple is tired of being small, but when she eats the fruit of the Biggle Tree in atop Zoonihorn Mountain, she grows so big, she becomes a destructive giant!. Be careful what you wish for; persevere, no matter what the problem.

programme.title: Fred Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Fred thinks Brains is acting strangely, and decides it’s because she has a secret crush on his best friend Sir Percival. Fred secretly spies on them to learn their secret, only to embarrass himself in the process.

programme.title: The Vanishing Snowball
programme.desc: Jamillah wakes Aladdin by gently resting a snowball in his face. At first hes outraged that his face is wet and shes woken him up until he sees the snowball up close. Frozen water from the sky! Amazing! Hes just getting to grips with it when it starts to melt in the Baghdad heat. Genie offers to fly them to the mountains on the carpet but the carpet breaks and whilst hes fixing it the snowball starts to waste away. Aladdin tries to rush it the physician, desperate to find something to keep it cool but by the time he gets there its already gone. Aladdin is crushed but Jamillah gives him something even better - a snow globe! Now he can watch it snow every day..

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Sasha da a luz en prisión y Nina se lleva al bebé para dárselo a su hija Katia.

programme.title: La Pobre de Sasha
programme.desc: Sasha busca desesperadamente a su bebé.

programme.title: Salvar a Sandra
programme.desc: Una pareja lucha contra la industria farmacéutica para salvar a su hija diagnosticada con una rara enfermedad.

programme.title: Mi Boda Toscana
programme.desc: Los dueños de una lujosa villa en la Toscana reciben a parejas comprometidas para celebrar bodas de ensueño.

programme.title: Market Open
programme.desc: Market Open

programme.title: Market Pulse
programme.desc: Market Pulse

programme.title: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 1
programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 1

programme.title: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2
programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2

programme.title: Power Lunch
programme.desc: The business team gathers and rounds up all GCC market activities with analysts from different markets sharing their views live.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: popeye meets ali baba's forty thieves (1080)
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Gripes-1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu learns the hard way about the need for military dicipline and procedures to maintain an effective army.

programme.title: Superman cartoons 3
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 3

programme.title: The Henpecked Rooster 1944
programme.desc: A henpecked rooster and a streetwise mouse team up to thwart the fowl's foul wife.

programme.title: A Car Tune Portrait -1937
programme.desc: A Car Tune Portrait -1937

programme.title: Leprechauns Gold 1949
programme.desc: A song-filled Noveltoon featuring the antics of the Irish Leprechauns during their annual gold-washing ceremony. It depicts the wee people of Ireland who flavor its traditions with laughs and legend.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Nearly Weds 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto both plan to marry Olive Oyl, but Popeye proposes first. When Olive says, "Yes!" to Popeye, Bluto sets out to make Popeye look bad, break up the wedding, and win Olive over.

programme.title: Felix Goes A-Hunting-1923
programme.desc: A wife throws her husband out of the house, telling him not to return unless he brings her a fur coat. Deciding that the only way he'll get one is to make his own, he grabs his rifle and goes hunting. All his efforts fail, though, until he meets Felix, who offers to help him shoot rabbits, and impresses the man with his marksmanship skills. However, it turns out that shooting the rabbits isn't quite as easy as they thought it would be.

programme.title: The Hole Idea 1955
programme.desc: A scientist invents the portable hole, only to have a thief steal his samples to go on a crime spree.

programme.title: Felix the Cat - Felix in Holly wood -1923
programme.desc: Willie, Felix's owner, gets an assignment to find out why the moon shines. Felix decides to help him get the answer, but winds up getting involved with bootleggers who are making "moonshine

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk-1952
programme.desc: Abbott & Costello's version of the famous fairy tale, about a young boy who trades the family cow for magic beans.

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend 1951
programme.desc: Shortly after coming to terms with his daughter's marriage, a father faces the prospect of becoming a grandfather

programme.title: Pool Sharks-1915
programme.desc: Two romantic rivals play a game of pool for the hand of their lady love.

programme.title: His Musical Career-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and his partner are to deliver a piano to 666 Prospect St. and repossess one from 999 Prospect St. They confuse the addresses. The difficulties of delivering the piano by mule cart, and most of the specific gags, appeared later in Laurel and Hardy's "The Music Box".

programme.title: Lonely Wives-1931
programme.desc: A lonely husband whose wife has been away hires a lookalike impersonator to fill his place and fool his mother-in-law while he plays around with a pretty coquette. Confusion prevails when his wife returns that evening

programme.title: See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!

Outlaws of the Range
programme.desc: When Steve Harper chases down some rustlers, he loses his gun in the ensuing fistfight. After Wilson is killed, Steve's gun is found nearby and he as arrested. Jimmy Wilson breaks him out of jail and he heads after the real killer

programme.title: Roll Along, Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Singing cowboy Randy shows up at Mrs. Blake's ranch. She is beset by bad guys, and Randy loves her daughter Janet.

programme.title: Rustlers' Hideout 1945
programme.desc: Bringing a herd of cattle to Dave Crockett, Billy halts before going through the pass where many herds have been rustled. He is right as there are two men after Crockett's ranch and packing plant which will be theirs if Crockett fails to pay off his note. When their attempt to get Crockett's son in financial trouble is broken up by Billy and their men fail to rustle the herd, they then poison the water hole

programme.title: Scrooge 1932
programme.desc: In Scrooge, Seymour Hicks brings Charles Dickens’ immortal Ebenezer Scrooge to life in one of the earliest sound versions of A Christmas Carol. On a cold Christmas Eve, the miserly Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley, and three spirits who reveal the shadows of his past, present, and future. Faced with his own greed and the suffering it causes, Scrooge must choose between a lonely grave and redemption. Atmospheric and faithful to Dickens’ classic tale, this 1932 adaptation delivers timeless holiday magic and a powerful message of compassion.

programme.title: The Big 22 Rifle for Christmas 1952
programme.desc: In The Big 22 Rifle for Christmas, a heartwarming holiday drama turns tragic when a boy’s dream gift becomes the center of an unexpected accident. As a small-town community reels, the story explores themes of responsibility, forgiveness, and the true meaning of Christmas. Tenderly told and emotionally powerful, this short film offers a timeless reminder of the importance of love, understanding, and family during the holiday season.

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem 1956
programme.desc: In The Star of Bethlehem, the timeless Nativity story is brought to life in a reverent and beautifully crafted short film. Through vivid visuals and heartfelt narration, the journey of Mary and Joseph, the shepherds in the fields, and the guiding star that led the Wise Men to Bethlehem are retold with warmth and devotion. With its simple yet powerful storytelling, this classic reminds audiences of the wonder, hope, and faith at the heart of Christmas.

programme.title: The Miracle on 34th St 1955
programme.desc: In The Miracle on 34th Street, a kindly old man hired to play Santa Claus at Macy’s insists that he is the real Kris Kringle. As his warmth and generosity touch everyone around him, skeptics take him to court to prove his claim. Blending holiday charm, heartfelt performances, and a timeless message about faith and belief, this television adaptation of the classic story reminds audiences that sometimes the greatest miracles are the ones we choose to believe in.

programme.title: Scrooge 1932
programme.desc: In Scrooge, Seymour Hicks brings Charles Dickens’ immortal Ebenezer Scrooge to life in one of the earliest sound versions of A Christmas Carol. On a cold Christmas Eve, the miserly Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley, and three spirits who reveal the shadows of his past, present, and future. Faced with his own greed and the suffering it causes, Scrooge must choose between a lonely grave and redemption. Atmospheric and faithful to Dickens’ classic tale, this 1932 adaptation delivers timeless holiday magic and a powerful message of compassion.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: The Littlest Angel 1969
programme.desc: In The Littlest Angel, the beloved holiday story comes to life in a touching musical special. Jerry Skinner stars as a small boy who enters heaven but struggles to fit in among the angels. Longing for the simple joys of his earthly life, he offers a humble gift that becomes the most treasured of all. With heartfelt songs, tender performances, and a timeless message of love and faith, this family favorite captures the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Django Defies Sartana 1970
programme.desc: In Django Defies Sartana, two of the West’s deadliest gunslingers clash in a storm of bullets and betrayal. When Django is framed for a ruthless robbery, Sartana rides in to bring him down—but both soon uncover a darker plot driving the violence. Torn between rivalry and reluctant alliance, the two face off against treachery, outlaws, and each other in a Spaghetti Western loaded with double-crosses, blazing shootouts, and nonstop action.

programme.title: Rock River Renegades 1942
programme.desc: In Rock River Renegades, the Range Busters roar back into action! When a dangerous gang stirs up trouble along Rock River, Crash Corrigan, Dusty King, and Alibi Terhune saddle up to bring law and order to the frontier. With fast-paced gunfights, daring stunts, and Alibi’s trademark humor, this action-packed Western delivers all the thrills fans of the series love.

programme.title: Death Valley 1982
programme.desc: In Death Valley, a young boy’s vacation turns into a nightmare when he witnesses a brutal murder in the desert. Trapped in the desolate wilderness with his mother (Catherine Hicks) and her new boyfriend (Paul Le Mat), he becomes the target of a relentless killer. Starring a young Peter Billingsley and Stephen McHattie as the menacing murderer, this suspense-filled thriller blends chilling atmosphere, tense chases, and shocking violence against the unforgiving backdrop of the Arizona desert.

programme.desc: The La Payunia Provincial Reserve, located in Malargüe, south of Mendoza, Argentina, is a volcanic complex with more than 800 volcanoes, considered a paradise for geologists and a natural treasure for its uniqueness.

programme.title: Viajar por mi país - Mount Tronador, Bariloche's highest mountain
programme.desc: The Tronador hill is a geologically inactive volcano; Its origin is associated with the training process of the Andes in the Pleistocene period, starting approximately 1.3 million years ago and ending 340,000 years ago

programme.title: Viajar por mi país - La Mejicana, Chilecito
programme.desc: The La Mexican Mine is auriferous mine located on Cerro Famatina, La Rioja, Argentina. It has what was one of the world's greatest engineering works, a cablecarril, built to transport the large amount of mineral to Chilecito in 1905.

programme.title: Live Escape
programme.desc: Two cops investigate an eerie empty homeless shelter with an endless maze of spaces and are attacked by zombies. They discover how these zombies were created. What will happen if zombies escape into the city?

programme.title: The Yunque Forest: Area 51
programme.desc: During a visit to El Yunque Forest, two cousins are kidnapped and bullied by federal agents after trying to summit the reserve's highest point. Unbeknown to them, there is an "Area 51" facility in there and they just stumbled into it.

programme.title: Delivery Boy
programme.desc: An inept delivery boy takes a package with sensitive information and is confused with El Tiburón, a dangerous spy. Now, Agent Azul must try to stop this delivery thru a city in the middle of a pandemic, while El Tiburón tries to recover the package and unleash a terrorist attack in Florida with the codes it contains and this Delivery Boy just tries to do its unassuming job.

programme.title: Reggaeton The Movie
programme.desc: It's the late 90s and two hairdressers and aspiring singers, a dancing student and a music producer dream of having a successful music career. But, another producer, one whose side project is a thriving drug dealing business, will force them to fight for their dreams of being superstars.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar enthusiast John to review the Jamie Garcia Reserva Special cigar. Together, they discuss its rich, full-bodied flavors, perfect burn, and overall experience, offering their takes on what makes this cigar a must-try for connoisseurs.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by cigar aficionado Marcus Newman to review the Bond Roberts Linea cigar. Together, they discuss its rich flavor profile, smooth draw, and craftsmanship, offering their expert takes on what sets this cigar apart from others in its class.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Every Cigar lounge has a story to tell, for Arnold Serafin that story spans generations. As a 4th generation cigar roller Arnold has a lot to say about the industry, family, and what truly brings people together : Cigars.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Kevin shares the inspiring story behind his brand, delving into the intentionality and philosophy that shape each blend. Discover what makes Konscious Cigars Co. stand out in the vibrant Tampa cigar scene and the mindful approach Kevin brings to the world of premium tobacco.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, your trusted tobacco experts, tackle the unique Drew Estate Year of the Rat cigar. They'll dissect its distinctive blend, construction, and flavor nuances, offering their seasoned perspectives on this celebrated release. Tune in to see if this Year of the Rat lives up to the hype and earns their stamp of approval.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Join seasoned tobacco authorities Brian and Chris as they put the highly anticipated Cohiba Riviera under the microscope. Expect a detailed breakdown of its construction, flavor profile, and overall smoking experience. Will the Riviera live up to the Cohiba name? Find out as Brian and Chris deliver their expert assessment on this premium cigar.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss takes a closer look at the Rocky Patel White Label cigar. Join Bryan as he reviews its smooth, balanced flavors, even burn, and overall performance, sharing his thoughts on what makes this cigar a top contender in its category.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: This week on Burn Rate, tobacco aficionados Brian and Chris delve into the diverse and often debated world of Gurkha cigars. They'll explore a specific Gurkha offering, dissecting its blend, construction, and flavor profile.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of "Behind the Blend," Sean Mobley interviews Rick Rodriguez, also known as "Chef Rick," from West Tampa Tobacco, who explains his nickname comes from blending tobacco like a chef uses food to create a desired flavor profile. Rick introduces new cigars like the "Circle of Life," a tribute to his mentors, and the "Double Crab," part of a Tampa-inspired trilogy, shaped like a "flying pig". He shares his personal journey into the cigar industry at age 40 and emphasizes that for him, cigars represent "connection" and a "gateway for a new friendship".

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV - TULUM (MEXICO)
programme.desc: Explora la magia de Tulum con Leo Saleh en este episodio de City Tour TV.

programme.title: CITY TOUR TV ( VIAJE EN CRUCERO !! ) MSC CRUCEROS
programme.desc: En el programa de hoy te mostramos nuestro viaje en un exclusivo crucero junto a la empresa MSC , estuvimos presentes en la temporada inaugural de Grandiosa. El espectacular MSC Grandiosa, con capacidad para 6.300 huéspedes, 2.421 cabinas y 19 cubiertas, presume de un diseño moderno y sorprendente y de una gran cantidad de experiencias e instalaciones que llevarán su viaje al siguiente nivel.

programme.title: FASHION DISTRICT: ¿Dónde y cómo INVERTIR EN MIAMI 2025? Mejores zonas, oportunidades y tips para el Real Estate
SHE RESONATES: Brenda Carrasco
programme.desc:
Chicas Guapas TV presenta SHE RESONATES, un nuevo programa que amplifica las voces de mujeres en la industria de la música, destacando sus trayectorias, desafíos y logros.
En este primer episodio, Dakyta entrevista a Brenda Carrasco, vicepresidenta de marketing y estrategia artística en Warner Music Latina. Brenda comparte su inspirador camino desde México hasta Estados Unidos, los retos de ser inmigrante en la industria y cómo logró posicionarse en un rol de liderazgo dentro de una de las compañías discográficas más influyentes del mundo.
No te pierdas esta conversación llena de aprendizaje y motivación para todas aquellas que buscan dejar huella en la música.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.
