programme.title: Guests Elle Marchelle, Ashle Renee, Kema
June 10, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 10, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Alicia Keys and Swizz Beatz: Divorce Rumors?
programme.desc: Rumors, rumors, rumors…or are they!? Recently there have been divorce rumors swirling around musical artist Alicia Keys and her husband, legendary producer Swizz Beatz. When asked about it, he felt it was so ridiculous he did not even engage in the discussion of the topic. However, he also did not exactly deny it. What is the right move here? This week, Nessa and Katrina B break down the pros and cons of each approach and shed some light on their own experiences in dealing with rumors! They also dive into some other hot relationship rumors swirling around some other young stars! Tune into this week’s episode for all the fun and laughs!

programme.title: Guests Precious G, Tia Santamaria, Courtney Benjamin
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Precious G, Tia Santamaria and Courtney Benjamin, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guest Omar Dorsey
programme.desc: Omar Dorsey is an actor’s actor. He’s starring on Bookie on Max now. Amazing convo about acting and Hollywood and the difference between a character actor and a leading actor.

programme.title: Guest Dr. Kaye Wise Whitehead
programme.desc: Dr. Kaye Wise Whitehead breaks down this year's Black History Month theme and shares how Black folks can lean into resistance in 2025.

programme.title: June 2, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 2, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Eric Hall
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Eric Hall talks new music, touring with Beyonce and Mary J. Blige, and the current state of the music industry.

programme.title: Highway to Health - Kevin Smith at Crossroads LA
programme.desc: Famed actor/director Kevin Smith reveals how he went vegan after almost dying of a heart attack.

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Oh Canada... Yum!
programme.desc: Vancouver has a happening vegan scene. Delish food and - in the summer - this island is paradise!

programme.title: At Home with The Jenners - Beans & Beginnings
programme.desc: Beans & Beginnings - Think tofu is boring? Think again.

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Tour San Diego's Food Scene!
programme.desc: San Diego is one of the coolest cities in America, it's California's second biggest city, after LA.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Runaway Cow Ice Cream
programme.desc: Visit a cool vegan ice cream shop on Chicago's South Side with a delicious backstory.

programme.title: Romesh Ranganathan - Vegan Comedian/TV Star
programme.desc: Host of the British quiz show, The Weakest Link, Ranganathan is an English stand up comic & actor.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Spirit Elephant
programme.desc: Kale Krew stars visit Spirit Elephant, a gourmet vegan restaurant in Winnetka, IL, near Chicago.

programme.title: BBQ Pulled "Duck"
programme.desc: This is so meaty and BBQ-y and delish. But, it’s not meat.

programme.title: Kale Krew - Soul Veg CIty
programme.desc: Soul Veg City was Chicago’s 1st vegan restaurant and part of the Windy City’s history.

programme.title: Pig Little Lies
programme.desc: It's moving day for the pigs - that should be simple, right? WRONG!

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - Just a Taste of the Bay Area
programme.desc: The Bay area has been ahead of its vegan time for decades! This trip definitely doesn't disappoint!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Toronto, Canada's Vegan Scene
programme.desc: Visit Canada's biggest city and get a handle on its astounding vegan restaurant scene.

programme.title: Milk Orphans
programme.desc: Brazilian animal activists race to rescue after hundreds of buffaloes are left to starve to death.

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Mexico City's Going Vegan!
programme.desc: Mexico City has one of the biggest vegan scenes anywhere! Rated V for Vegan's Eunice Reyes shows us!

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a mysterious crash and uncovers more than an object, but a massive government conspiracy. Inspired by the real life events of December 9, 1965 and one of America's most mysterious UFO incidents...

programme.title: Witch Trials
programme.desc: Two documentary filmmakers and an ex-cop investigate the disappearance of a young girl that is rumored to have been abducted by a witch in the haunted woods of Connecticut...

programme.title: Ouija Room
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman with autism begins summoning spirits to be her friends while her brother/caretaker is gone during the day, but the more time she spends with the spirits the more it becomes clear they aren't so friendly after all...

programme.title: Jack y Jill: Las Colinas del Infierno
programme.desc: Tras buscar a su hija desaparecida, una dama y su grupo de búsqueda descubren la leyenda que se esconde tras la pareja asesina de Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo 2
programme.desc: Esta es la continuación del MUNDO ES TUYO. Por fin sabremos que sucedió con los personajes de esta impactante historia.

programme.title: Dinero Maldito
programme.desc: En esta película les presento una historia muy triste donde un hombre pobre echa a perder su vida al encontrarse un dinero y hacerse rico. me acompañan el gran actor Sergio Reynoso y la guapísima Elizabeth Solís. No se la pierdan.

programme.title: Vidas Violentas
programme.desc: integrada por seis cortometrajes escritos y dirigidos por seis de los más connotados directores mexicanos, la película fue realizada y dirigida para concientizar y reducir la violencia de género, el acoso escolar en las escuelas y la violencia doméstica. Proviene de una iniciativa del gobierno en el marco de la campaña basta no violencia

programme.title: ¡Ni Te Me Acerques!
programme.desc: Él solo tenía que cuidar el hotel y teclear su novela, como Jack Nicholson en “El Resplandor”, pero de buen rollo. Y Llega la cuarentena y se queda le pilla en el Hotel Balneario de Ariño haciendo frente a la paranoia general, el acoso de las fuerzas del orden, las videollamadas de su novia, su madre y del conspiranoico Javi... Todos nos aburrimos mucho en el primer confinamiento. Juan no.

programme.title: El Mariachi Gringo
programme.desc: Comedia romántica sobre un joven de la América profunda que -tras tener como improvisado maestro de guitarra a un emigrante- viaja a México huyendo de su vida tediosa y de su familia, para ejercitarse como mariachi.

programme.title: Utopía 7
programme.desc: En un mundo postapocalíptico, una pandilla de jóvenes rebeldes lucha contra los mecanismos de alta tecnología de un sistema informático definitivo que había sido encargado por un grupo de élite para restablecer el orden y el equilibrio.

programme.title: Expediente 53
programme.desc: Esta es una historia de misterio y acción en la ciudad de Bryan Texas el comandante Gatel pide la ayuda del FBI ya que hay muchos desaparecidos, y asesinatos en la ciudad. Los agentes Gutiérrez, Bracho y Miravalle del FBI le comentan al comandante Gatel que ellos sospechan que puede ser obra de una secta satánica y que el líder es un demonio de nombre Abal que está en el cuerpo de una bella mujer de nombre Lilly.

programme.title: 72 Horas Para Morir
programme.desc: Su madre lo dejo en manos de su padre siendo un niño y el lo preparo para ser un gatillero y hacerse cargo del territorio de Texas, por eso lo apodan el Texano. Un día en la calle se encuentra con una mujer y ella le adivina su futuro, le dice que tiene 72 horas para morir... el texano no lo cree pero algo muy malo esta por suceder.

programme.title: Bent Knees Break Chains
programme.desc: While the chain of events isn't always your choice, your next decision still is. In “Bent Knees Break Chains,” we learn that our future isn’t defined by what happens to us, but is influenced by our choices instead.

programme.title: My Future is My Focus
programme.desc: They tried to harm you, but God… In “My Future Is My Focus,” we learn to stop fixating on our past hurts, and instead, focus on how God can work them into the future He has for us.

programme.title: This Is That Day
programme.desc: Don’t let the down days define you. In “This Is That Day,” Pastor Steven Furtick reminds us that God has given us what we need to win this day.

programme.title: God Chose You... Will You?
programme.desc: God didn’t say “do you” — He said “I knew you.” In “God Chose You… Will You?,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us move past our limitations and step into who He made us to be all along.

programme.title: I'm Not Stuck Unless I Stop
programme.desc: In “I’m Not Stuck Unless I Stop,” Pastor Steven unpacks the first mindset of his latest book, “Do The New You,” to teach us how to keep praising God before we see the victory.
